New Records: Chris Flexen extended his winless streak to 21 straight starts, the longest in team history
Key Match Events: Dominic Fletcher's RBI double sparked a five-run ninth inning
Zach DeLoach added a two-run single in the ninth inning
Wilyer Abreu and Connor Wong had solo homers for Boston
Pre-Game Insights: The White Sox had lost 14 of its last 15 games before rallying against Boston
Post-Match Reflections: Red Sox manager Alex Cora said 'We didn't do much today offensively'
Fitts said 'Today was really special just because I got to share it with my family and I'm really honored to be a Red Sox for today and hopefully for a long time'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The White Sox are nine losses away from tying the 1962 New York Mets for the most losses since 1900
The 1899 Cleveland Spiders hold the MLB loss record at 20-134
Fitts was acquired from the New York Yankees along with Weissert and another minor league pitcher for outfielder Alex Verdugo during the offseason
